pr_title: Fixed OncoKB proxy return type, and updated default URL

timeline.message: fixed OncoKB proxy return type, and updated default url
fixed OncoKB proxy return type, and updated default url

timeline.bodyText: @onursumer what was the error by using String return type?
timeline.author: kalletlak

replies.bodyText: @kalletlak content is attached to response.text instead of response.body if we use String, and that causes OncoKB frontend API client to always return an empty response.
replies.author: onursumer
